text: Bermondsey () is a town in the London Borough of Southwark, England. It is southeast of Charing Cross. To the west of Bermondsey is Southwark, to the east is Rotherhithe and Deptford, to the south is Walworth and Peckham, and to the north is the City of London and Whitechapel. Category:Areas of London
title: Bermondsey
